headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Campbell's (CPB) Leadership Change After VP Termination for Misconduct
summary: Earlier this month, Campbell's announced the termination of Vice President of Information Technology Martin Bally after he was recorded making disparaging and racist remarks about the company and its products, following an internal review and investigation. This development raised significant reputational concerns and prompted Campbell's to publicly reaffirm its commitment to company values and food quality. We'll consider how the company's decisive action to address leadership misconduct...

We'll consider how the company's decisive action to address leadership misconduct...

headline: The Score: Campbell’s, Kohl’s, Alphabet and More Stocks That Defined the Week
summary: Campbell’s fired an executive this past week after he was allegedly caught on tape saying the company made “highly processed food” for “poor people.”  “The comments were vulgar, offensive and false, and we apologize for the hurt they have caused,” the company said Wednesday.  Investors sent the two tech leaders trading in opposite directions during Tuesday’s session, with Nvidia shares falling 2.6% and Google parent Alphabet rising 1.6%.
